scripts.build:all: tsc && vite build && mkdirp backend_exe && cd ../backend && python -m venv .venv && .venv\Scripts\activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && pyinstaller --onefile --noconsole --name WebCamApp-Backend main.py && copy dist\WebCamApp-Backend.exe ..\frontend\backend_exe\WebCamApp-Backend.exe && cd ..\frontend && electron-builder
scripts.clean: rimraf dist dist-electron release backend_exe && cd ../backend && rimraf dist build __pycache__ && del *.spec 2>nul || echo No .spec files found
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && cd ../backend && rimraf .venv && cd ../frontend && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force
